name: Khalil Saikal
story: Khalil Saikal was born in a small town in Iran. He grew up wanting to serve his country and saw joining the military as the best way to do so. After completing his training, he became a missile specialist, and he quickly rose to the rank of private due to his exceptional knowledge and skillset. Khalil takes his job very seriously and spends countless hours training to ensure he is always at the top of his game. Despite being single, he is very close to his family and often talks to them when he is away on missions.
